wave_0_per_point3=

per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.437*time) + 0.40*sin(0.970*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.344*time) + 0.40*sin(0.841*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.650*( 0.60*sin(1.251*time) + 0.40*sin(1.055*time) );
per_frame_4=rot = rot + 0.04*( 0.60*sin(0.181*time) + 0.09*sin(-0.279*time) );
per_frame_5=cx = cx + 0.10*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.10*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_6=cy = cy + 0.10*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.10*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_7=dx = dx + 0.0040*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_8=dy = dy + 0.0040*( 0.60*sin(0.284*time) + 0.40*sin(0.247*time) );
per_frame_9=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%6,0);
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=//wave_x = 0.1 + int(rand(80))*0.01;
per_frame_12=//wave_y = 0.1 + int(rand(80))*0.01;
per_frame_13=t2 = time*6;
per_frame_14=wave_x = 0.5 + 0.2*( 0.60*sin(0.374*t2) + 0.40*sin(0.294*t2) );
per_frame_15=wave_y = 0.5 + 0.2*( 0.60*sin(0.393*t2) + 0.40*sin(0.223*t2) );
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv2, uv3;
comp_4=`    float ang2, c, s;
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    uv -= 0.5;
comp_7=`    uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    ang2 = 6.28*0.333;
comp_10=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_11=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_12=`    uv2.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_13=`    uv2.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`    ang2 = 6.28*0.667;
comp_16=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_17=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_18=`    uv3.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_19=`    uv3.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_20=`
comp_21=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv + 0.5).xyz;
comp_22=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv2 + 0.5).xyz);
comp_23=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv3 + 0.5).xyz);
comp_24=`
comp_25=`    //ret *= 1.3; // a little bit of overbright
comp_26=`}
comp_27=`
comp_28=`
